pros: Frameless blown glass design makes this hourglass stand out
Its blue sand doesn't stop running, and despite the low price, this is a fairly accurate 15-minute hourglass.Stands 6.5 inches tall
cons: This all-glass piece is very fragile, and some customers noted that it can be difficult to stand upright

customer_reviews.title: Timed it five times: mean=13m39s, sd=1m15s
customer_reviews.text: Timed it five times (mean=13m39s, sd=1m15s): 12m17s, 13m06s, 14m57s, 12m55s, 15m01s Its height is about 160 mm / 6.3" (~1cm longer than an iPhone 6 Plus) The photo shows it between IKEA's KLOCKIS and my 16 oz cup. It's thin and light while sturdy enough to travel from China to the U.S. East Coast in one piece :-) Giving it four stars because the mean is not within one SD of the 15 minutes claimed. (In a normal/Gaussian distribution of data, about two-thirds of the data values will fall within one standard deviation)
customer_reviews.author: Talha

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I got a defective one idk
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice, but has small black marks on the glass which will not come off. Wishing I would’ve just bought one at the at home store now. I hate returning stuff especially glass through the mail so I’ll still be giving it as a gift. Just disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: play4ever

customer_reviews.title: Not that you want to be rough with them but I have moved twice for my job and it always gets thrown in my "desk box" when I move
customer_reviews.text: When I got this in the mail I almost expected it to be broken but these are surprisingly strong. Not that you want to be rough with them but I have moved twice for my job and it always gets thrown in my "desk box" when I move and it's held up great. I might get one of a different color later on but it's a nice whimsical item to have at my desk and my employees like fiddling with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gen Marceau

customer_reviews.title: 15 minutes of intensive workout
customer_reviews.text: Works really well has not gotten stuck some of the littler ones that I bought the three-minute one seems to be getting stuck but this one the 15-minute is doing well I use it for 15 minutes of intensive workout in the house
customer_reviews.author: Sharpei from Whittier

customer_reviews.title: Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I have MS and need to get up from my desk and stretch every 15 minutes or so......if I don't my legs become very stiff and painful. This was a great solution to remind me. I just have to remember to turn it over each time!
customer_reviews.author: TPA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful crafted item. Perfect size, smooth feel, very accurate. Highly recommended. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and relaxing
customer_reviews.text: So pretty...I just got this to have on my desk at my office to have something pretty to play with, and I love it. I get lots of compliments on it, too. It's just as pictured, and I'd definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: arklein82

customer_reviews.title: Accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Timed with my I-phone. Accurate within 2 seconds. Not very big, but perfect for my desk to give me a visual timer to meet personal deadlines. Basically comes up to the bottom of my computer monitor screen.
customer_reviews.author: Scout

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Ok. It was mailed straight from China. It forever to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Maria U.

customer_reviews.title: a good hourglass. Does exactly what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as specified, a good hourglass. Does exactly what it's supposed to. Although there is a piece of something white inside it-- looks like a piece of bone or something? I can't get to it without breaking the glass, so I ignore it, and most times I don't even see it. A good buy for the price! Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely crafted! If you're looking for something huge, this is not the item for you!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Angel N. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Protect your IQ
customer_reviews.text: Great for preventing excess stupidity. When a idiot at work comes to talk to you just flip it over and when the sand runs out you must end your conversation with them as any more time spent conversing with them will reduce your intelligence.
customer_reviews.author: Whistler

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! I was looking for a small trinket to take to my NaNoWriMo write-ins and this fit the ticket. It's the right shade of blue, came intact and on time and is only a few seconds off for 15 mins. (yes, I did time it.) It's been very fun to use and wrapped in a towel, it travels very well. Extremely happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Chera Sea

customer_reviews.title: Just wish it was an hourglass as it supposed to be for an hour and it was only for 15 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Just wish it was an hourglass as it supposed to be for an hour and it was only for 15 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Davia M

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Product is shorter and wider than it appears in the picture. I had one like the one pictures before and it worked well. This one stops because it gets plugged sometimes. Bummer. It's still pretty though!
customer_reviews.author: Maria DiDonna

customer_reviews.title: Nice window decorations. Haven't actually used them as timers.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't end up needing these for the purpose I bought them for, but they've still made cool looking decorations. Very pretty sitting in the window.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Vella

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: At first the sand was getting stuck but now it seems to be working as it should!
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: 15 minutes, 9 seconds. Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: Reminds me not to stay one one task too long at work.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Clark

customer_reviews.title: Very nice timer. It appears to be well made
customer_reviews.text: Very nice timer. It appears to be well made, stands up easily and works just as expected. Great value and appealing color.
customer_reviews.author: G. Blakey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Actually a lot stronger in the middle than you may think.
customer_reviews.author: Collins

customer_reviews.title: small but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Much Smaller than expected but works just fine and no other problems!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Parker

product_meta.title: JayDeco Blown Glass 15 Minutes Hourglass (Blue)
product_meta.description: A feel for classic glass sand timer. Both modern and functional. At just 6.5 inches tall. Once all the sand has run to the bottom bulb, the device can be inverted to measure time again.
feature_bullets: Solid hand blown glass for 15 minutes time counting.
Sand flows through in 15-minutes; flip over for the sand timer to start again.
3-inch wide, 6.5 inches tall is perfect for tabletops decoration.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars44 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
